channel.title: RunePkz - Oldschool PK Server
channel.description:
[CENTER]Hey, my name is Ven0cide, and I made this thread to notify you about the project I'm working on. I call it RunePkz and it's here to make you forget about the Korasi prods, the turmoil pures and the dclaw rushers. RunePkz is about running around in Edgeville, pking with whip/dds & veng like a beast.
Base: Project Insanity
[B]Features;[/B] • Pretty pro PK system • Custom HP bar, wider & thinner • No bullshit "You must have 3 items equipped to attack someone" or "You must wait 10 minutes before trading" system. • 1 account per IP to stop xfering starters. • Donating will give you donator points, which can be exchanged for special items, (pictures coming soon). It will also give you access to a donator island with special shops & monsters with low defense and lots of amounts of HP, and on top of all of this a crystal key! The crystal key is used when opening the chest at Home, it can give you a varity of rare items and will be destroyed when used. You will receive a crystal key when you donate, no matter how small / big amount.
[B]Things left to do until Beta release;[/B] • Add pure shops • Make NPC drops a bit more pwnage • Thieve from stalls give cash instead of items • Fix bugs / dupes • Make a simple forum.
[B]Pictures;[/B] XP Lamps(14MB big gif, might take some time to load.) 99% Done. [IMG]http://i1196.photobucket.com/albums/aa411/Ven0cide/clip0114-new.gif[/img]
Misc. client stuff [IMG]http://i1196.photobucket.com/albums/aa411/Ven0cide/Clientloading1.png[/img]
Shops [IMG]http://i1196.photobucket.com/albums/aa411/Ven0cide/newshops.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1196.photobucket.com/albums/aa411/Ven0cide/Armourstore1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1196.photobucket.com/albums/aa411/Ven0cide/Weaponstore1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1196.photobucket.com/albums/aa411/Ven0cide/Rangestore1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1196.photobucket.com/albums/aa411/Ven0cide/Magicstore1.png[/img]
[b]Interfaces[/b] Deleted chivalry & piety [IMG]http://i1196.photobucket.com/albums/aa411/Ven0cide/Prayerinterface1.png[/img]
Getting items will be easy, you buy basic items from shops, and get advanced items from monsters. Money is gained from thieving stalls / monsters.
[B]Update log;[/B] [U]4th September[/U] • Made progress thread • Deleted Chivalry & Piety • Fixed low & high alchemy dupe • Fixed some bugs
[B]Other...[/B] • I want to point out that the shops location will NOT be where they are on release, I just put them there so I didn't have to run around to get to them. [/CENTER]

item.title: RunePkz - Oldschool PK Server
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:4, topic:413465”]I’m looking forward to a 317 with no customs, it’s hard to find nowadays. I made the same decision with my server.

But I still had to remove your forums link for advertising without permission, sorry.[/quote]
I’ve released 4 servers. Only one of them had customs. Check it out.

Read full topic

@cLass1 wrote:

[CENTER]Hey, my name is Ven0cide, and I made this thread to notify you about the project I’m working on. I call it RunePkz and it’s here to make you forget about the Korasi prods, the turmoil pures and the dclaw rushers. RunePkz is about running around in Edgeville, pking with whip/dds & veng like a beast.

Base: Project Insanity

Features;
• Pretty pro PK system
• Custom HP bar, wider & thinner
• No bullshit “You must have 3 items equipped to attack someone” or “You must wait 10 minutes before trading” system.
• 1 account per IP to stop xfering starters.
• Donating will give you donator points, which can be exchanged for special items, (pictures coming soon). It will also give you access to a donator island with special shops & monsters with low defense and lots of amounts of HP, and on top of all of this a crystal key! The crystal key is used when opening the chest at Home, it can give you a varity of rare items and will be destroyed when used. You will receive a crystal key when you donate, no matter how small / big amount.

• Add pure shops
• Make NPC drops a bit more pwnage
• Thieve from stalls give cash instead of items
• Fix bugs / dupes
• Make a simple forum.
